actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from spending or obligating any appropriated funds to purchase, procure, or upgrade computers used by certain farmer service agencies of the Department of Agriculture prior to the implementation by the Secretary of reforms of the field structure and organization of the farmer service agencies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from spending or obligating any appropriated funds to purchase, procure, or upgrade computers used by certain farmer service agencies of the Department of Agriculture prior to the implementation by the Secretary of reforms of the field structure and organization of the farmer service agencies.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from spending or obligating any appropriated funds to purchase, procure, or upgrade computers used by certain farmer service agencies of the Department of Agriculture prior to the implementation by the Secretary of reforms of the field structure and organization of the farmer service agencies, and for other purposes.
